de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence

Class WeightWidgetSQLiteRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence.WeightWidgetSQLiteRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable, IRepository<WeightRecord,IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>, IWeightWidgetRepository, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class WeightWidgetSQLiteRepository
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
implements IWeightWidgetRepository
    Implements the IWeightWidgetRepository interface using an SQLite database.

                                                  throws IWeightWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative,
                                                         IWeightWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive,
                                                         IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed,
                                                         IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException
        Gets a sequence of weight records with the maximum length of count in descending order sorted by the time of measurement beginning at the offset.
        Specified by:
        GetRecordsDescending in interface IRepository<WeightRecord,IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>
        Specified by:
        GetRecordsDescending in interface IWeightWidgetRepository
        Parameters:
        offset - zero based n-th element in descending order where to begin reading records
        count - maximum number of record to be read from the repository
        Returns:
        read sequence of weight records
        Throws:
        OffsetIsNegative - when offset is negative.
        CountIsNotPositive - when count is not positive.
        RepositoryDisposed - when the repository was already disposed.
        RepositoryException - when an unexpected I/O error occurs.
        IWeightWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative
        IWeightWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive
        IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed
        IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException
